TalentsTiers.Name: Unbreakable Will
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the duration of Stun, Fear, and Silence effects done to you by an additional [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Twin Disciplines
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage done by your holy spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Silent Resolve
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the threat generated by your Holy and Discipline spells by [@value2]% and reduces the chance your Priest helpful spells and damage over time effects will be dispelled by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Inner Fire
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the effect of your Inner Fire spell by [@value]%, and increases the total number of charges by [@value2].

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Power Word: Fortitude
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the effect of your Power Word: Fortitude and Prayer of Fortitude spells by [@value]%. and increases your total stamina by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Martyrdom
TalentsTiers.Description: Gives you a [@value]% chance to gain the Focused Casting effect that lasts for [@value3] sec after being the victim of a melee or ranged critical strike. The Focused Casting effect reduces the pushback suffered from damaging attacks while casting Priest spells and decreases the duration of Interrupt effects by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Meditation
TalentsTiers.Description: Allows [@value]% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.

TalentsTiers.Name: Inner Focus
TalentsTiers.Description:
Instant
3 min cooldown

When activated, reduces the Mana cost of your next spell by 100% and increases its critical effect chance by 25% if it is capable of a critical effect.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Power Word: Shield
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage absorbed by your Power Word: Shield by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Absolution
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the mana cost of your Dispel Magic, Cure Disease, Abolish Disease and Mass Dispel spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Mental Agility
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the mana cost of your instant cast spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Mana Burn
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the casting time of your Mana Burn spell by [@value] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Reflective Shield
TalentsTiers.Description: Causes [@value]% of the damage absorbed by your Power Word: Shield to reflect back at the attacker. This damage causes no threat.

TalentsTiers.Name: Mental Strength
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your total Intellect by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Soul Warding
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Power Word: Shield ability by 4 sec. and reduces the mana cost of your Power Word: Shield by 15%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Focused Power
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases damage and healing done by your Holy and Shadow spells by [@value]%. In addition, your Mass Dispel cast time is reduced by [@value2] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Enlightenment
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your total Spirit by [@value]% and increases your spell haste by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Focused Will
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your spell critical effect chance by [@value]%, and after taking a critical hit you gain the Focused Will effect, reducing all damage taken by [@value2]% and increasing healing effects on you by [@value3]%.  Stacks up to [@value4] times.  Lasts [@value5] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Power Infusion
TalentsTiers.Description:
12% of base mana
30 yd range

Instant Cast
2 min cooldown

Infuses the target with power, increasing spell casting speed by 20% and reducing the mana cost of all spells by 20%. Lasts 15 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Flash Heal
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the mana cost of your Flash Heal by [@value]%, and increases the critical effect chance of your Flash Heal by [@value2]% on friendly targets at or below [@value3]% health.

TalentsTiers.Name: Renewed Hope
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical effect chance of your Flash Heal, Greater Heal and Penance (Heal) spells by [@value]% on targets afflicted by the Weakened Soul effect. and you have a [@value2]% chance to reduce all damage taken by [@value3]% for [@value4] min to all friendly party and raid targets when you cast Power Word: Shield. This effect has a [@value5] sec cooldown.

TalentsTiers.Name: Rapture
TalentsTiers.Description: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed or dispelled you are instantly energized with [@value]% of your total mana, and you have a [@value2]% chance to energize your shielded target with [@value3]% total mana, [@value4] rage, [@value5] energy or [@value6] runic power. This effect can only occur once every [@value7] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Aspiration
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Inner Focus, Power Infusion, Pain Suppression and Penance spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Divine Aegis
TalentsTiers.Description: Critical heals create a protective shield on the target, absorbing [@value]% of the amount healed. Lasts [@value2] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Pain Suppression
TalentsTiers.Description:
6% of base mana
40 yd range

Instant Cast
3 min cooldown

Instantly reduces a friendly target's threat by 5%, reduces all damage taken by 40% and increases resistance to Dispel mechanics by 65% for 8 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Grace
TalentsTiers.Description: Your Flash Heal, Greater Heal, and Penance spells have a [@value]% chance to bless the target with Grace, increasing all healing received from the Priest by [@value2]%. This effect will stack up to [@value3] times. Effect lasts [@value4] sec. Grace only can be active on one target at a time.

TalentsTiers.Name: Borrowed Time
TalentsTiers.Description: Grants [@value]% spell haste for your next spell after casting Power Word: Shield, and increases the amount absorbed by your Power Word: Shield equal to [@value2]% of your spell power.

TalentsTiers.Name: Penance
TalentsTiers.Description:
12% of base mana
Enemy: 30 yd range

Friendly: 40 yd range

Instant Cast
10 sec cooldown

Launches a volley of holy light at the target, causing 288 Holy damage to an enemy, or 1484 to 1676 healing to an ally every 1 sec for 2 sec.

Talent Has Trainable Ranks
